content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/39ea4423-5411-4a1f-bef3-5d6717f20f8d/image2018-11-13_10-17-19.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":634,\"height\":122},\"align\":\"align-center\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hooray! Our congratulations on becoming a part of EPAM Company. We hope you will have an amazing time working with us and we are happy that you've joined the team.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4aaaada5-be87-4dbf-8b5b-89d9d60df7c3/image2018-11-14_15-9-7.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":712,\"height\":267},\"align\":\"align-center\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Today EPAM is a global software engineering company. We are growing very fast, and we need to hire the best engineering talent. Last years weâ€™ve interviewed thousands of candidates, hired hundreds of new engineers. What we do now is that we want the right people to join us. We need to check that the level of expertise, personality and attitude of any candidate is the right fit for the company.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This rapid growth of EPAM has prompted the creation of the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/TI\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Technical Interview Global Service\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", which has been designed to support and promote a Technical Interview process that helps EPAM to achieve its strategic goals.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Technical Interview Service deals with the organization of technical interviews in accordance with the unified technical interview quality standards.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TI service is acting as a part of Global Service Desk.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
